title: Ranked Rewards?
body:
Ok so everybody is getting their ranked rewards. I finished the season at silver 2

I don't have my icon, and my profile's banner trim is gone(previously gold). I tried relogging and what not. Should I continue to wait or open a ticket.

replies.body:
We're still rolling out rewards, as *Zombiemaster* mentioned. If you hold on for a bit, we'll get those out to you. ^.^

I hope that clears this up for you.

Hi there. Riot has not yet finished giving out the rewards to all eligible players. It can take some time, so just be patient. 

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=O8qOZk6k,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-10T19:01:44.693+0000)
>
> You may see that some content is still missing or that one player may have received them sooner than another, but don't worry!  Per the [Season 6 FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon), we aim to have this wrapped up by the 21st.  Hope that helps offer some ease!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/O8qOZk6k-rewards-problem?comment=0000
